summary.para: Builds a that will function like a Circuit Breaker.

The circuit will break after exceptions that are handled by this policy are raised. The circuit will stay broken for the . Any attempt to execute this policy while the circuit is broken, will immediately throw a containing the exception that broke the cicuit.
If the first action after the break duration period results in an exception, the circuit will break again for another , otherwise it will reset.

member.param: The number of exceptions that are allowed before opening the circuit.
The duration the circuit will stay open before resetting.
member.remarks: (see "Release It!" by Michael T. Nygard fi)
member.exception: exceptionsAllowedBeforeBreaking;Value must be greater than zero.
